comment: I bottled this on 9/9/14 ....split the batch using 1/2 oz juniper berries and 1/2 oz scullcap boilled in molasses and filtered to prime 2nd iteration with 8oz hawthorne tea and 1oz of dried lavender flowers in molasses filtered and used to prime. OG 0f 1.062 FG of 1.029 for approx abv of 4.33%
